title: Launcher Error
body: My AVG antivirus recently used its PC clean up application and I believe it deleted files I needed to play LoL. When I start up the launcher client it pops up an error block stating "The code execution cannot proceed because BugSplat.dll was not found". Checked my files of my computer and ofund no file with that name. How do I fix this so I can play LoL again?

replies.body: It kind of sounds like some of the client files ended up damaged or corrupted somehow. Let's have you grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and use it to quickly run a repair on the client. That should be able to fix everything and get you back on the Rift, but hit me back if you're still having troubles.
I went to my computers control panel and uninstalled all the files I have for the application and then reinstalled everything from your main site. Same error keeps popping up.

That can work most of the time, but like I mentioned it sounds like some of those files are corrupted when you're installing. Use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure everything is wiped and reinstalled from scratch.
Tried that. The tool didn't work.
I ran every test it would allow  me. Only log I could find said reinstall failed. No note stated why  though.
